verbs.description: [V: Ditching] [ARG1: his prepared speech] [ARGM-LOC: in its expensive leather binder] ( he joked ) , [ARG0: President Trump] delivered a rousing , optimistic view of America 's past , present and future Tuesday night .
Ditching his prepared speech in its expensive leather binder ( [ARG0: he] [V: joked] ) , President Trump delivered a rousing , optimistic view of America 's past , present and future Tuesday night .

[R-ARG0: Ditching his prepared speech in its expensive leather binder ( he joked )] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: delivered] [ARG1: a rousing , optimistic view of America 's past , present and future] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday night] .
